title: Ownership Structure of CenterPoint Energy Inc

content.text: As of the most recent filing, institutional investors hold approximately 93.83% of CenterPoint Energy Inc stock. The top institutional shareholders are The Vanguard Group, Inc. with 8.92% of shares outstanding, BlackRock, Inc. with 8.79%, and State Street Corporation with 7.25%.

Insiders, including company executives and board members, own about 0.16% of CenterPoint Energy Inc stock. Some notable insiders include John W. Somerhalder II, the CEO, President, and Director, who owns 0.04% of shares, and Scott M. Prochazka, the Former President and CEO, who owns 0.05% of shares.

Apart from institutional and insider ownership, there are also major shareholders who hold a significant portion of CenterPoint Energy Inc stock. Some of the major shareholders include The Vanguard Group, Inc. with 9.26% of shares outstanding, BlackRock, Inc. with 9.16%, and Capital Research and Management Company with 6.14%.
